forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.
